duties_responsibilities.duty: Create memorable and visually appealing meals that meet high standards and delight guests.
Manage kitchen supplies, equipment, and minimize waste while maintaining cleanliness and hygiene.
Ensure kitchen safety by reporting unsafe equipment and following safety procedures.
Assist with washing up and other kitchen duties as needed.
Provide excellent customer service and assistance to guests when required.
Be flexible with work shifts and take on ad-hoc duties when necessary.

education_certification.credential: Diploma in Culinary Arts or related field (Bachelor's degree preferred)
